page.title: 04HAMPSTEAD HEATH
page.content: {Hampstead Heath}covers a large area of this block. It is a mixture of rough grassland and wooded areas, and is enjoyed by a great many Londoners. There are several old and famous {Inns}on the Heath like the{Bull and {Bush, Jack Straws Castle}and the {Spaniards Inn}and huge fairs have been held there for centuries. One part of the Heath is called {Parliament Hill}and from the top you can get a wonderful view of London. Lots of people gather here to fly kites and in the winter to go toboganning. There are also several ponds on the Heath which are used for swimming and model boat sailing. During the summer months concerts are held by the lake in the grounds of {Kenwood House,}and are sometimes accompanied by firework displays.
